headline.main: UNION FOR REPEAL OF NEUTRALITY ACT; 3,000 Members of N.M.U. Hold Its Only Function Is to Handi- cap Our Aid to Britain

lead_paragraph: Three thousand members of the National Maritime Union, at a membership meeting held in New York last week, went on record in favor of immediate repeal of the neutrality law and urged the arming of American ships carrying supplies to the enemies of Germany.
abstract: Roosevelt urged bv NMU to denounce Wheeler and Nye
